description:
Application for non-material  amendment to 17F/0072
To vary condition 2 attached to 14F/2707. (To erect non-food retail unit with garden centre and drive through coffee shop (Use Class A3/A5); refurbish and extend former Blockbuster unit and refurbish Subway unit; lay out associated car parking, landscaping and access) so as to allow changes to building layout and position of the new build unit retail unit (1m to the west); change location of sprinkler tanks and substation; change offices from two storey to single storey structure; changes to roof plan, reposition doors and reconfigure parking layout.
site_address: Former Ian Skelly Site and adjacent land, Mill Lane, Liverpool, L13 4EJ
